sentence.text: Lactate dehydrogenase-A (pyruvate metabolic process) can promote Warburg effect to produce lactate and Adenosine Triphosphate (ATP) in aerobic condition, which contributes to oncogenesis metastasis and drug resistance in various cancers.

We determined that pyruvate metabolic process was over-expressed in GBC tumor tissues compared with normal tissues, which was also an independent prognostic factor for the overall survival of GBC patients by tissue microarrays analysis.
Moreover, we confirmed that knockdown of pyruvate metabolic process could inhibit tumor growth in vivo.
